comments:
Description:
Library does not work correctly.

Build number:
2.1.3.v20070517-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a library.
2. Go to Master Page, resize the master page using the ruler. 

Expected result:
1. Layout works correctly.
2. No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
1. Layout does not work correctly. (See library.jpg)
2. The ruler does not work correctly and exception is thrown out when move the 
   ruler. (see masterpage.jpg)
